title: God of War Ragnarok Release Date Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.06.22
description:
God of War Ragnarok release date is finally unveiled, Forspoken gets delayed, and a UK regulator investigating Microsoft-Activision Blizzard acquisition. Janet and special guest Jared Petty react to all this and more as they also try and figure out how many Nintendo Switches they will buy during its lifecycle.

Follow Jared: https://twitter.com/pettycommajared , listen to his Top 100 Games podcast, and Runtime (Limited Run Games' podcast!).

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:30 - Housekeeping

Merch of the Month - The Tropical Collection - is live! Designed by Nick at Campfire Design Studio: kindafunny.com/store


Porty hats will be restocked next Friday 7/15

The Roper Report  -

00:08:50 - God of War Ragnarok is coming!
00:28:08 - Forspoken Delayed
00:34:53 - UK regulator investigating Microsoft-Activision Blizzard acquisition
00:43:11 - Ads
00:44:56 - Splatoon OLED Model
00:50:25 - Intellivision Amico Console Still in Development
00:57:54 - CD Projekt Red Announces Gwent: Rogue Mage
01:01:54 - She-Hulk in Marvel's Avengers
01:06:10 - Out today
01:06:18 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
